name: Codeigniter3-ion-auth-bootstrap
tagline: Forked Ion-Auth and add compatibilty of Codeigniter version 3 and bootstrap forms
body:
This is a Fork from https://github.com/benedmunds/CodeIgniter-Ion-Auth 
Compatibility for CODEIGNITER version 3 will be completely added as the lang('id, 'dict') is deprecated function
and forms will be made with bootstrap
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
